message: They don't make men like this now.....they were so kindhearted and giving. I'm sorry Isidore and his beloved wife had to die in the icy waters that terrible night the Titanic sank.

Seaworld has not taken animals from the wild in over 30 years. Management has changed three times since then. Look at what they stand for now.. Conservation and rescue. The parks help fund that.. I think they do way more good than bad and the media sensationalizes the extremists point of view. Let's all look at the big picture here. Where would we be without Seaworld?

I love how any counter to Nancy's claims are """"hateful"""" or """"negative"""". She posts a couple of anecdotal items she believes Trump is """"fixing"""", Kim responds with details and questions and it's """"negative"""" and """"hateful"""" and she isn't discussing """"facts"""". And yet anyone who doesn't support or believe a word Trump says has filters over THEIR ears. That's some serious cognitive dissonance and projection, Nancy. Just because you enjoy being gaslit doesn't mean the rest of us are too stupid to realize what's happening.
